Plot: Newlyweds are terrorized by demonic forces after moving into a large house that was the site of a grisly mass murder a year before.
Title: The Amityville Horror
Writer: Scott Kosar (screenplay), Jay Anson (novel), Sandor Stern (earlier screenplay), George Lutz (material), Kathy Lutz (material)
Actors: Ryan Reynolds, Melissa George, Jesse James, Jimmy Bennett
tomatoConsensus: A so-so remake of a so-so original.
